welcome.desc: You will be redirected to the source code control management system for authentication.

new.slug.placeholder: Only English, numbers are supported, e.g.: auto, auto25
new.slug.tooltip: Used in conjunction with the code repository ID to generate a unique identification for the project
new.repoId.placeholder: Please enter org/repo or repository ID, e.g.: owner/repo
new.repoId.extra: Supported formats: org/repo (e.g., owner/repo) or repository ID
new.check.not.found: Repository not found, will create new repository
new.repo.not.exists: Repository not found, will create new repository
new.step.select.desc: Select provider and enter repository identifier

projects.desc: View all projects related to your account
projects.name: Repo
projects.search_keywords: Search by repo id or name
projects.overview_search_keywords: Enter the "Commit Sha" or "Branch" or "Compare Target" keyword for search
projects.max_coverage_tooltip: Maximum coverage for the last 30 days
projects.statements_tooltip: Statement coverage is also overall coverage
projects.statements_tour_description: Click on the percentage number in this column to jump to the full coverage details page.
projects.newlines_tour_description: Click on the percentage number in this column to jump to the changed line coverage details page.
projects.only.default.branch: Look only at the default branch
projects.config.title: Project Configuration
projects.config.default.branch.desc: The default branch acts on the coverage trend graphs and tables in the overview page.
projects.config.example2: Configure the include, exclude, and extensions fields. The include field indicates files to be detected, the exclude field indicates files not to be detected, and the extensions field indicates file suffixes to be detected.
projects.config.name: Name
projects.detail.search.placeholder: Enter the file path to search
projects.accumulative.title: Analysis Records
projects.accumulative.desc: Manage accumulative records between Git commits
projects.accumulative.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this accumulative record?
projects.accumulative.modal.title: Add Analysis Record
projects.accumulative.form.after.label: After Commit SHA
projects.accumulative.form.after.placeholder: Please enter the full 40-character Commit SHA
projects.accumulative.form.after.invalid: Invalid SHA format (should be a 40-character hexadecimal string)
projects.accumulative.form.now.label: Now Commit SHA
projects.accumulative.form.now.placeholder: Please enter the full 40-character Commit SHA
projects.accumulative.form.now.invalid: Invalid SHA format (should be a 40-character hexadecimal string)
